column1: Kata Robata////What a wonderful place! There was about a 35 minute wait
column2: although we were quoted about 45 minutes to an hour
column3: and it was well worth it. My boyfriend and I made our way to the bar where we were welcomed by someone who was coming around to give samples of sushi to the guests who were waiting. When we were seated
column4: we were greeted by our server
column6: who was outstanding. He had the best recommendations
column7: and was so attentive. I can't recall the names of all the plates we got
column8: but all I can say was that his recommendations really made dinner this evening an experience. It's been a while since I have had such a good meal with such excellent service
column10: of course. We will be visiting again!
